checkers
Class Move

java.lang.Object
  checkers.Move

public class Move
extends java.lang.Object

Move class packages a single "Move" in checkers. Includes the piece, from, and to locations. Class used only in AI.

movePiece

public void movePiece()
Moves the piece to the "to" location. Doesn't matter where the piece is now. Same as Piece.moveTo(to);

unmovePiece

public void unmovePiece()
Moves the piece to the "from" location. Doesn't matter where the piece is now. Same as Piece.moveTo(from);
